evs4j
Interface Listener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionDecorator
public interface Listener

A Listener object performs processing of all incoming events, including new configurations, message delivery, and alerts.

Method Summary
 void onAlert(Alert alert)
          Processes an alert.
 void onConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
          Installs the new configuration.
 void onMessage(Message message)
          Processes an incoming message.
